pageContent.content: {"title":"Lembaga Jaminan Mutu (LJM)","subtitle":"Menjamin standar kualitas pendidikan, penelitian, dan pengabdian masyarakat di lingkungan Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap secara berkelanjutan.","titleEn":"Quality Assurance Institute (QAI)","subtitleEn":"Ensuring the quality standards of education, research, and community service within Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap sustainably."}

lpmProfile.about: Lembaga Penjaminan Mutu atau di singkat LPM adalah unsur pelaksana sistem penjaminan mutu di Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap. LPM dipimpin oleh seorang Kepala yang bertanggung jawab langsung kepada Rektor dengan berkoordinasi dengan Wakil Rektor.
lpmProfile.aboutEn: The Quality Assurance Institute, abbreviated as LPM, is the implementing element of the quality assurance system at Al-Irsyad University Cilacap. LPM is led by a Head who reports directly to the Rector in coordination with the Vice Rector.
lpmProfile.vision: Menjadi lembaga penjaminan mutu yang unggul, kredibel, dan akuntabel dalam mewujudkan budaya mutu di Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap pada tahun 2045.
lpmProfile.mission: ["Mengembangkan dan menetapkan standar mutu pendidikan, penelitian, dan pengabdian kepada masyarakat.","Melaksanakan monitoring dan evaluasi secara berkala terhadap pelaksanaan standar mutu.","Mendorong peningkatan budaya mutu secara berkelanjutan di lingkungan universitas.","Meningkatkan kompetensi sumber daya manusia dalam bidang penjaminan mutu."]
lpmProfile.activityCycle: ["Penetapan standar pendidikan tinggi yang ditetapkan oleh PT merupakan kegiatan penentuan standar/ukuran","Pelaksanaan standar pendidikan tinggi yang ditetapkan oleh perguruan tinggi merupakan kegiatan pembandingan antara luaran kegiatan pemenuhuan standar/ukuran dengan standar/ukuran yang ditetapkan.","Controlling the implementation of higher education standards set by universities involves analyzing the causes of unmet standards/measures in order to take corrective action.","Evaluasi pelaksanaan standar dengan membandingkan antara luaran pelaksanaan dengan standar","Peningkatan satndar pendidikan tinggi yang ditetapkan oleh perguruan tinggi merupakan kegiatan perbaikan standar/ukuran agar lebih tinggi dari standar/ukuran yang telah ditetapkan"]
lpmProfile.activityCycleEn: ["The establishment of higher education standards by PT is an activity of determining standards/measures.","The implementation of higher education standards set by universities is an activity that compares the outcomes of activities that meet standards/measures with the standards/measures that have been set.","Controlling the implementation of higher education standards set by universities involves analyzing the causes of unmet standards/measures in order to take corrective action.","Evaluate the implementation of standards by comparing the implementation outcomes with the standards.","Improvements to higher education standards set by universities are activities aimed at raising standards/benchmarks above those already established."]
lpmProfile.mainDuties:
Merencanakan, melaksanakan, memonitor, mengevaluasi dan melaporkan pelaksanakan sistem penjaminan mutu di UNAIC. Secara rutin LPM berkewajiban mengimplementasikan Sistem Penjaminan Mutu Internal (SPMI) dan Sistem Penjaminan Mutu Eksternal (SPME) secara terencana dan berkelanjutan (Continuous Quality Improvement/CQI), hingga akhirnya terbentuk budaya mutu yang dapat menjamin keberlangsungan kegiatan TriDharma Perguruan Tinggi di Universitas AL-Irsyad Cilacap.
LPM juga mempunyai tanggung jawab untuk menyusun sistim manajemen mutu, menjamin pelaksanaan sistim manajemen mutu, dan melakukan evaluasi, dan terus-menerus meningkatkan serta mengembangkan sistim penjaminan mutu, baik itu pada tingkat universitas hingga program studi.
lpmProfile.mainDutiesEn:
Planning, implementing, monitoring, evaluating, and reporting on the implementation of the quality assurance system at UNAIC. The LPM is routinely responsible for implementing the Internal Quality Assurance System (SPMI) and External Quality Assurance System (SPME) in a planned and sustainable manner (Continuous Quality Improvement/CQI), until a culture of quality is established that can ensure the sustainability of the TriDharma Perguruan Tinggi activities at AL-Irsyad University Cilacap.
The LPM also has the responsibility to develop a quality management system, ensure the implementation of the quality management system, conduct evaluations, and continuously improve and develop the quality assurance system, both at the university level and at the program study level.

lpmLegalBasis.title: Peraturan Menteri Pendidikan Tinggi, Sains, dan Teknologi Nomor 39 Tahun 2025 tentang Penjaminan Mutu Pendidikan Tinggi
lpmLegalBasis.titleEn: Regulation of the Minister of Higher Education, Science, and Technology Number 39 of 2025 concerning Quality Assurance in Higher Education

lpmLegalBasis.title: Peraturan Badan Akreditasi Nasional Perguruan Tinggi (BAN-PT) Nomor 35 Tahun 2025 tentang Instrumen Akreditasi Perguruan Tinggi untuk Status Terakreditasi dan Status Terakreditasi Unggul
lpmLegalBasis.titleEn: Regulation of the National Accreditation Agency for Higher Education (BAN-PT) Number 35 of 2025 concerning Higher Education Accreditation Instruments for Accredited Status and Excellent Accredited Status

lpmLegalBasis.title: Peraturan Badan Akreditasi Nasional Perguruan Tinggi (BAN-PT) Nomor 13 Tahun 2025 tentang Instrumen Akreditasi Program Studi untuk Perolehan Status Terakreditasi Sementara, Status Terakreditasi, dan Status Terakreditasi Unggul
lpmLegalBasis.titleEn: Regulation of the National Accreditation Agency for Higher Education (BAN-PT) Number 13 of 2025 concerning Study Program Accreditation Instruments for Obtaining Provisional Accredited Status, Accredited Status, and Excellent Accredited Status

lpmLegalBasis.title: Statuta UNAIC 2021 - 2025 Pedoman hukum tertinggi yang mengatur prinsip dasar penyelenggaraan dan tata kelola di Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap
lpmLegalBasis.titleEn: UNAIC Statutes 2021 - 2025 The highest legal guidelines governing the basic principles of administration and governance at Al-Irsyad University Cilacap

lpmLegalBasis.title: Renstra UNAIC 2021 - 2025 Dokumen perencanaan strategis yang memuat arah kebijakan pengembangan universitas guna mencapai visi jangka panjang
lpmLegalBasis.titleEn: UNAIC Strategic Plan 2021-2025 A strategic planning document that outlines the university's development policy direction to achieve its long-term vision.

lpmLegalBasis.title: Landasan Hukum LJM
lpmLegalBasis.description: Sebagai manifestasi legalitas operasional, LJM UNAIC bergerak berdasarkan Surat Keputusan (SK) Rektor mengenai pembentukan lembaga serta pengangkatan pengelola yang sah. Tata kelola ini mencakup penjabaran tugas pokok dan fungsi (Tupoksi) yang jelas bagi setiap personel, memastikan setiap elemen dalam struktur organisasi dapat menjalankan wewenangnya secara efektif demi tercapainya standar mutu yang diharapkan.
lpmLegalBasis.descriptionEn: As a manifestation of operational legality, LJM UNAIC operates based on the Rector's Decree regarding the establishment of the institution and the appointment of legitimate managers. This governance includes a clear description of the main duties and functions (Tupoksi) for each personnel, ensuring that every element in the organizational structure can exercise its authority effectively in order to achieve the expected quality standards.

lpmLegalBasis.title: Undang-Undang Republik Indonesia Nomor 12 Tahun 2012 tentang Pendidikan Tinggi
lpmLegalBasis.titleEn: Law of the Republic of Indonesia Number 12 of 2012 concerning Higher Education

faculty.name: Fakultas Ilmu Kesehatan
faculty.deanTitleEn: Dean of the Faculty of Health Sciences
faculty.deanMessage: Fakultas Ilmu Kesehatan (FIKES) UNAIC hadir sebagai jembatan bagi para calon tenaga kesehatan profesional untuk meraih mimpi. Kami berkomitmen menyelenggarakan pendidikan tinggi kesehatan yang tidak hanya unggul secara akademis, namun juga menjunjung tinggi nilai-nilai Islami.
faculty.deanMessageEn: The Faculty of Health Sciences (FIKES) UNAIC serves as a bridge for future professional health workers to achieve their dreams. We are committed to organizing higher health education that is not only academically excellent but also upholds Islamic values.
faculty.vision: Menjadi Fakultas Ilmu Kesehatan yang Unggul, Berkarakter Islami dan Berdaya Saing Global pada Tahun 2045.
faculty.visionEn: To become an Excellent Health Science Faculty, with Islamic Character and Global Competitiveness by 2045.
faculty.missions: "[\"Menyelenggarakan pendidikan dan pengajaran ilmu kesehatan yang berkualitas, profesional dan berkarakter Islami.\",\"Melaksanakan penelitian yang inovatif dan teruji di bidang kesehatan yang relevan dengan kebutuhan masyarakat.\",\"Melaksanakan pengabdian kepada masyarakat di bidang kesehatan yang tepat guna.\",\"Menjalin kerjasama yang berkelanjutan dengan berbagai institusi tingkat nasional dan internasional.\"]"
faculty.missionsEn: "[\"Organizing quality, professional health science education and teaching with Islamic character.\",\"Carrying out innovative and tested research in the field of health that is relevant to community needs.\",\"Carrying out appropriate community internal service in the field of health.\",\"Establishing sustainable cooperation with various national and international institutions.\"]"

faculty.name: Fakultas Farmasi, Sains & Teknologi
faculty.deanTitleEn: Dean of the Faculty of Pharmacy, Science & Technology
faculty.deanMessage: Fakultas Farmasi, Sains & Teknologi (FASTEK) UNAIC berkomitmen melahirkan ilmuwan dan praktisi teknologi yang tidak hanya mahir secara teknis, tetapi juga memiliki integritas moral. Kami fokus pada riset yang solutif bagi tantangan kesehatan dan teknologi masa depan.
faculty.deanMessageEn: The Faculty of Pharmacy, Science & Technology (FASTEK) at UNAIC is committed to producing scientists and technology practitioners who are not only technically proficient but also possess moral integrity. We focus on solution-driven research for future health and technological challenges.
faculty.vision: Menjadi Fakultas yang unggul dalam pengembangan IPTEK bidang Farmasi dan Teknologi Informasi yang berkarakter Islami dan Berdaya Saing Global pada Tahun 2045.
faculty.visionEn: To become an excellent Faculty in the development of science and technology in the fields of Pharmacy and Information Technology with Islamic character and Global Competitiveness by 2045.
faculty.missions: ["Menyelenggarakan pendidikan farmasi dan teknologi yang adaptif terhadap industri 4.0.","Mengembangkan riset sains dan teknologi yang inovatif dan aplikatif.","Melaksanakan pengabdian masyarakat berbasis produk IPTEK.","Membangun kemitraan strategis dengan industri nasional dan internasional."]
faculty.missionsEn: ["Organizing pharmacy and technology education that is adaptive to Industry 4.0.","Developing innovative and applicable science and technology research.","Carrying out community service based on science and technology products.","Building strategic partnerships with national and international industries."]

faculty.name: Fakultas Ekonomi & Bisnis
faculty.deanTitleEn: Dean of the Faculty of Economics & Business
faculty.deanMessage: FEB UNAIC mencetak technopreneur masa depan. Kami percaya bahwa bisnis yang sukses adalah bisnis yang dibangun di atas nilai-nilai etika Islami dan pemanfaatan teknologi digital yang cerdas.
faculty.deanMessageEn: FEB UNAIC creates future technopreneurs. We believe that a successful business is one built on Islamic ethical values and the smart utilization of digital technology.
faculty.vision: Menjadi Fakultas Ekonomi dan Bisnis yang Unggul dan Berkarakter Islami dalam Bidang Digital Business dan Entrepreneurship pada Tahun 2045.
faculty.visionEn: To become an Excellent Faculty of Economics and Business with Islamic Character in the Field of Digital Business and Entrepreneurship by 2045.
faculty.missions: ["Menyelenggarakan pendidikan bisnis digital dan kewirausahaan berbasis nilai Islami.","Melakukan penelitian inovatif di bidang ekonomi kreatif dan digital.","Memberikan pendampingan bisnis kepada UMKM dan masyarakat luas.","Menciptakan ekosistem kewirausahaan di lingkungan kampus."]
faculty.missionsEn: ["Organizing digital business and entrepreneurship education based on Islamic values.","Conducting innovative research in the creative and digital economy sectors.","Providing business assistance to MSMEs and the wider community.","Creating an entrepreneurial ecosystem within the campus environment."]

facultyProgram.name: D3 Keperawatan
facultyProgram.advantages: "[{\"title\":\"Praktik Klinik Intensif\",\"desc\":\"Fokus pada keterampilan teknis keperawatan.\"}]"
facultyProgram.advantagesEn: "[{\"title\":\"Intensive Clinical Practice\",\"desc\":\"Focus on technical nursing skills.\"}]"
facultyProgram.description: Program Studi D3 Keperawatan UNAIC menghasilkan perawat pelaksana yang terampil dan berakhlakul karimah.
facultyProgram.descriptionEn: The D3 Nursing Program at UNAIC produces skilled vocational nurses with noble character.

facultyProgram.name: Profesi Bidan
facultyProgram.advantages: "[{\"title\":\"Lulusan Kompeten\",\"desc\":\"Lulusan siap kerja dengan sertifikasi kompetensi nasional.\"}]"
facultyProgram.advantagesEn: "[{\"title\":\"Competent Graduates\",\"desc\":\"Work-ready graduates with national competence certification.\"}]"
facultyProgram.description: Program Pendidikan Profesi Bidan UNAIC merupakan kelanjutan dari S1 Kebidanan untuk mendapatkan gelar Bidan (Bds.).
facultyProgram.descriptionEn: The Midwife Profession Education Program at UNAIC is a continuation of S1 Midwifery to obtain the Midwife title (Bds.).

facultyProgram.name: Profesi Ners
facultyProgram.advantages: "[{\"title\":\"Kerjasama RS Luas\",\"desc\":\"Praktik di berbagai RS tipe A dan B di Indonesia.\"}]"
facultyProgram.advantagesEn: "[{\"title\":\"Wide Hospital Network\",\"desc\":\"Practice in various Type A and B hospitals in Indonesia.\"}]"
facultyProgram.description: Program Pendidikan Profesi Ners UNAIC mencetak Ners yang memiliki kemampuan klinis dan manajerial yang unggul.
facultyProgram.descriptionEn: The Nurse Profession Education Program at UNAIC produces Nurses with excellent clinical and managerial abilities.

facultyProgram.name: S1 Kebidanan
facultyProgram.advantages: "[{\"title\":\"Kebidanan Komplementer\",\"desc\":\"Fokus pada pelayanan kebidanan alami dan holistik.\"}]"
facultyProgram.advantagesEn: "[{\"title\":\"Complementary Midwifery\",\"desc\":\"Focus on natural and holistic midwifery services.\"}]"
facultyProgram.description: Program Studi S1 Kebidanan UNAIC mencetak bidan profesional yang unggul dalam pelayanan kebidanan komplementer dan berbasis nilai Islami.
facultyProgram.descriptionEn: The S1 Midwifery Program at UNAIC produces professional midwives who excel in complementary midwifery services based on Islamic values.

facultyProgram.name: S1 Ilmu Keperawatan

The curriculum combines theory, clinical practice, research, and Islamic values that strengthen nursing professional ethics.

academicPolicy.title: Kebijakan Integritas Akademik
academicPolicy.description: Aturan untuk menjaga kejujuran, etika, dan mutu dalam seluruh kegiatan akademik di Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap.
academicPolicy.descriptionEn: Rules to uphold honesty, ethics, and quality in all academic activities at Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap.
academicPolicy.scope: Berlaku bagi seluruh mahasiswa, dosen, dan tenaga kependidikan dalam kegiatan akademik (perkuliahan, penelitian, publikasi, ujian, tugas akhir).
academicPolicy.scopeEn: Applies to all students, lecturers, and academic staff in activities such as courses, research, publications, examinations, and final projects.

academicPolicy.title: Kebijakan Cuti Akademik
academicPolicy.description: Aturan mengenai prosedur pengajuan, persetujuan, dan konsekuensi cuti akademik bagi mahasiswa Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap.
academicPolicy.descriptionEn: Rules regarding the procedure, approval, and consequences of academic leave for students at Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap.
academicPolicy.scope: Berlaku bagi seluruh mahasiswa aktif di Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap yang ingin mengajukan cuti akademik.
academicPolicy.scopeEn: Applies to all active students of Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap who wish to apply for academic leave.
academicPolicy.responsible: Biro Akademik dan Wakil Rektor Bidang Akademik
academicPolicy.responsibleEn: Academic Bureau and Vice Rector for Academic Affairs

academicPolicy.title: Kebijakan Penilaian Akademik
academicPolicy.description: Aturan mengenai sistem penilaian hasil belajar mahasiswa di Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap.
academicPolicy.descriptionEn: Rules regarding the student learning assessment system at Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap.
academicPolicy.scope: Berlaku untuk seluruh mata kuliah di semua program studi, mencakup tugas, kuis, ujian tengah semester, ujian akhir semester, dan penilaian tugas akhir.
academicPolicy.scopeEn: Applies to all courses in every study program, covering assignments, quizzes, mid-term exams, final exams, and final project assessments.
academicPolicy.responsible: Wakil Rektor Bidang Akademik dan Ketua Program Studi
academicPolicy.responsibleEn: Vice Rector for Academic Affairs and Head of Study Program

lppmProfile.vision: Menjadi lembaga penelitian dan pengabdian kepada masyarakat yang unggul dalam pengembangan ilmu pengetahuan, teknologi, dan inovasi berbasis nilai-nilai Islam untuk kemajuan bangsa.
lppmProfile.visionEn: To become a leading research and community service institution in the development of science, technology, and innovation based on Islamic values for the advancement of the nation.
lppmProfile.mission: ["Mengembangkan penelitian yang inovatif dan berdampak","Mendorong pengabdian masyarakat yang berkelanjutan","Meningkatkan publikasi ilmiah berkualitas","Membina kerjasama riset dengan stakeholder"]
lppmProfile.missionEn: ["Developing innovative and impactful research","Promoting sustainable community service","Increasing high-quality scientific publications","Fostering research collaboration with stakeholders"]
lppmProfile.tasks: ["Koordinasi kegiatan penelitian","Pengelolaan program PKM","Fasilitasi publikasi ilmiah","Pengembangan kerjasama riset","Pengelolaan laboratorium riset"]
lppmProfile.tasksEn: ["Coordination of research activities","PKM program management","Facilitation of scientific publications","Development of research cooperation","Research laboratory management"]
lppmProfile.ctaDescription: Ajukan proposal penelitian atau pengabdian masyarakat Anda. LPPM UNAIC siap mendampingi dan memfasilitasi pengembangan riset yang berdampak.
lppmProfile.ctaDescriptionEn: Submit your research or community service proposal. LPPM UNAIC is ready to assist and facilitate the development of impactful research.

researchConfig.title: Penelitian & Inovasi
researchConfig.subtitle: Mengembangkan ilmu pengetahuan dan teknologi melalui riset berkualitas.
researchConfig.subtitleEn: Developing science and technology through high-quality research.
researchConfig.focusDesc: Penelitian di UNAIC diarahkan untuk menjawab tantangan kesehatan dan teknologi masa depan. Kami berfokus pada pengembangan inovasi yang dapat diterapkan langsung untuk meningkatkan kualitas hidup masyarakat. Penelitian mencakup bidang kesehatan, farmasi, kebidanan, dan teknologi informasi.
researchConfig.focusDescEn: Research at UNAIC is directed towards answering future health and technology challenges. We focus on developing innovations that can be applied directly to improve the community's quality of life. Research spans health, pharmacy, midwifery, and information technology fields.

researchProject.title: Pengembangan Media Pembelajaran Digital Berbasis AR
researchProject.description: Penelitian pengembangan media pembelajaran augmented reality untuk mata kuliah farmasi.

researchProject.title: Analisis Kandungan Nutrisi Tanaman Obat Tradisional
researchProject.description: Penelitian kandungan nutrisi dan senyawa aktif pada tanaman obat tradisional lokal.

researchProject.title: Sistem Informasi Manajemen Apotek Berbasis Web
researchProject.description: Pengembangan sistem informasi terintegrasi untuk manajemen apotek modern.

pkmConfig.title: Pengabdian Masyarakat
pkmConfig.subtitle: Hilirisasi hasil riset untuk kebermanfaatan masyarakat luas.
pkmConfig.subtitleEn: Downstreaming research results for the benefit of the wider community.
pkmConfig.impactDesc: UNAIC berkomitmen untuk tidak hanya mengembangkan ilmu di menara gading, tetapi juga turun tangan menyelesaikan permasalahan di masyarakat. Melalui program Pengabdian Kepada Masyarakat (PKM), kami menerapkan teknologi dan ilmu pengetahuan untuk memberdayakan komunitas, meningkatkan kesehatan, dan mendukung ekonomi lokal.
pkmConfig.impactDescEn: UNAIC is committed to not just developing knowledge in an ivory tower, but also hands-on solving problems in society. Through the Community Service (PKM) program, we apply technology and science to empower communities, improve health, and support the local economy.

pkmProject.title: Pelatihan Kesehatan Ibu & Anak di Cilacap Dan Banyumas
pkmProject.titleEn: Maternal and Child Health Training in Cilacap and Banyumas
pkmProject.description: Program pengabdian masyarakat melalui pelatihan kesehatan ibu dan anak di wilayah Cilacap Dan Banyumas.
pkmProject.descriptionEn: Community service program through maternal and child health training in the Cilacap and Banyumas regions.

pkmProject.title: Pemberdayaan UMKM Melalui Digital Marketing
pkmProject.description: Program pemberdayaan UMKM di Cilacap melalui pelatihan digital marketing dan e-commerce.

pkmProject.title: Edukasi Gizi Seimbang untuk Lansia
pkmProject.description: Program edukasi gizi seimbang dan pola hidup sehat untuk lansia di panti werdha.

publication.title: Jurnal Pharmaqueous
publication.description: Pharmaqueous Jurnal adalah jurnal Ilmiah Kefarmasian adalah jurnal ilmiah yang memuat penelitian dan kajian di bidang kefarmasian. Jurnal ini terbit secara berkala dan menyediakan artikel-artikel hasil penelitian terbaru, seperti uji resistensi bakteri penyebab infeksi saluran kemih terhadap antibiotik. Selain itu, situs jurnal juga menyediakan arsip edisi sebelumnya, template penulisan, serta informasi indeksasi dan riwayat publikasi.
publication.descriptionEn: Pharmaqueous Journal is a scientific journal that publishes research and studies in the field of pharmacy. This journal is published periodically and provides articles on the latest research, such as testing the resistance of bacteria that cause urinary tract infections to antibiotics. In addition, the journal's website also provides archives of previous editions, writing templates, as well as indexing information and publication history.

publication.title: Jurnal Pengabdian Masyarakat Al-Irsyad (JPMA)
publication.description: Jurnal Pengabdian Masyarakat Al-Irsyad (JPMA) adalah publikasi ilmiah yang berfokus pada kegiatan pengabdian masyarakat. Halaman jurnal ini menampilkan artikel-artikel hasil pengabdian dari berbagai bidang, terutama yang berkaitan dengan pemberdayaan masyarakat, pendidikan, kesehatan, dan sosial. Selain menyediakan edisi terbaru, situs JPMA juga memuat arsip terbitan sebelumnya, pedoman penulisan bagi penulis, serta informasi mengenai proses penerbitan dan indeksasi. Jurnal ini menjadi wadah bagi akademisi dan praktisi untuk berbagi pengalaman serta inovasi dalam mendukung pembangunan masyarakat.
publication.descriptionEn: The Al-Irsyad Community Service Journal (JPMA) is a scientific publication that focuses on community service activities. This journal features articles on community service outcomes from various fields, particularly those related to community empowerment, education, health, and social issues. In addition to providing the latest edition, the JPMA website also contains archives of previous issues, writing guidelines for authors, and information on the publication and indexing process. This journal serves as a platform for academics and practitioners to share their experiences and innovations in supporting community development.

publication.title: Jurnal Kesehatan Al-Irsyad (JKA)
publication.description:
Jurnal Kesehatan Al-Irsyad (JKA) adalah publikasi ilmiah yang diterbitkan oleh LPPM Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap. Jurnal ini memuat hasil penelitian dan kajian kritis di bidang keperawatan, kebidanan, fisioterapi, serta kesehatan masyarakat. Terbit dua kali setahun (Maret dan September), JKA berfungsi sebagai media komunikasi bagi dosen, peneliti, dan praktisi kesehatan.

Jurnal ini telah terakreditasi (S4) oleh Kementerian Riset, Teknologi, dan Pendidikan Tinggi, serta terindeks di SINTA, Google Scholar, One Search, dan Garuda. Dengan p-ISSN 2086-0722 dan e-ISSN 2549-6603, JKA menjadi wadah penting untuk menyebarluaskan karya ilmiah yang mendukung pengembangan ilmu kesehatan di Indonesia.
publication.descriptionEn:
The Al-Irsyad Health Journal (JKA) is a scientific publication issued by the Research and Community Service Institute (LPPM) of Al-Irsyad University Cilacap. This journal contains research results and critical studies in the fields of nursing, midwifery, physiotherapy, and public health. Published twice a year (March and September), JKA serves as a communication medium for lecturers, researchers, and health practitioners.

The journal is accredited (S4) by the Ministry of Research, Technology, and Higher Education, and indexed in SINTA, Google Scholar, One Search, and Garuda. With p-ISSN 2086-0722 and e-ISSN 2549-6603, JKA is an important platform for disseminating scientific works that support the development of health sciences in Indonesia.

publication.title: Trends of Nursing Science (Tens Journal)
publication.description:
Trends of Nursing Science (Tens Journal) adalah jurnal ilmiah yang diterbitkan oleh Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap. Halaman ini menampilkan publikasi penelitian di bidang keperawatan dan ilmu kesehatan, dengan fokus pada pengembangan ilmu keperawatan, praktik klinis, serta inovasi dalam pelayanan kesehatan.

Jurnal ini menyediakan edisi terbaru dan arsip terbitan sebelumnya, lengkap dengan pedoman penulisan bagi penulis, informasi editorial, serta sistem pengelolaan naskah berbasis OJS (Open Journal System). Dengan format terstruktur dan akses terbuka, Tens Journal menjadi wadah akademisi, peneliti, dan praktisi kesehatan untuk menyebarluaskan hasil penelitian yang mendukung peningkatan kualitas pelayanan keperawatan dan kesehatan masyarakat.
publication.descriptionEn:
Trends of Nursing Science (Tens Journal) is a scientific journal published by Al-Irsyad University Cilacap. This page features research publications in the field of nursing and health sciences, with a focus on the development of nursing science, clinical practice, and innovation in health services.

The journal provides the latest edition and archives of previous issues, complete with writing guidelines for authors, editorial information, and an OJS (Open Journal System)-based manuscript management system. With its structured format and open access, Tens Journal serves as a platform for academics, researchers, and healthcare practitioners to disseminate research findings that support the improvement of nursing care and public health services.

publication.title: JETBus (Journal Economic, Technology and Business)
publication.description: Journal Economic, Technology & Business adalah jurnal peer-review akses terbuka yang diterbitkan oleh Fakultas Ekonomi dan Bisnis, Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap, bekerja sama dengan e-Jurnal Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap. Dengan fokus pada ekonomi kreatif, teknologi informasi, dan manajemen bisnis berupaya menjembatani kesenjangan antara wawasan akademis dan aplikasi praktis, dengan tujuan menjawab tantangan dan memanfaatkan peluang di era digitalisasi.
publication.descriptionEn: Journal of Economics, Technology & Business is an open access peer-reviewed journal published by the Faculty of Economics and Business, Al-Irsyad University Cilacap, in collaboration with e-Journal Al-Irsyad University Cilacap. With a focus on creative economy, information technology, and business management, it seeks to bridge the gap between academic insights and practical applications, with the aim of addressing challenges and capitalizing on opportunities in the era of digitalization.

publication.title: INFOKABIN (Informatika, Komputasi, Aplikasi dan Bisnis)
publication.titleEn: INFOKABIN (Information Technology, Computing, Applications, and Business)
publication.description:
INFOKABIN (Informatika, Komputasi, Aplikasi dan Bisnis) adalah jurnal ilmiah yang diterbitkan oleh Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap. Halaman ini menampilkan artikel penelitian dan kajian yang berfokus pada bidang informatika, komputasi, aplikasi, serta bisnis.

Jurnal ini menjadi wadah akademisi, peneliti, dan praktisi untuk menyebarluaskan hasil penelitian yang relevan dengan perkembangan teknologi informasi dan dunia usaha. Selain menyediakan edisi terbaru, halaman INFOKABIN juga memuat arsip terbitan sebelumnya, pedoman penulisan, template naskah, serta informasi editorial dan indeksasi. Dengan akses terbuka, INFOKABIN mendukung pengembangan ilmu pengetahuan dan penerapan teknologi dalam berbagai aspek bisnis dan kehidupan masyarakat.
publication.descriptionEn:
INFOKABIN (Informatics, Computing, Applications, and Business) is a scientific journal published by Al-Irsyad University Cilacap. This page features research articles and studies focusing on the fields of informatics, computing, applications, and business.

This journal serves as a platform for academics, researchers, and practitioners to disseminate research findings relevant to advancements in information technology and the business world. In addition to providing the latest edition, the INFOKABIN page also includes archives of previous issues, writing guidelines, manuscript templates, as well as editorial and indexing information. With open access, INFOKABIN supports the development of knowledge and the application of technology across various aspects of business and societal life.

pmbConfig.heroSubtitle: Bergabunglah dengan Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap dan jadilah generasi unggul yang berkarakter islami dan berdaya saing global.
pmbConfig.heroSubtitleEn: Join Al-Irsyad University of Cilacap and become a superior generation with Islamic character and global competitiveness.
